channel.title: Chat logger script help

item.title: Chat logger script help
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

when you call SaveToChatLog, it saves the last line into an SRL global variable called TheLine, you can do whatever you want with that

SaveToChatLog is also called in FindNormalRandoms

[scar]
SaveToChatLog;
WriteLn(TheLine);
[/scar]

Read full topic

the inchate procedure is in srl yes, it grabs the last line of convesations and returns true if it matches your text.

item.title: Chat logger script help
item.dc:creator: @Smartzkid Smartzkid
item.description:
@Smartzkid wrote:

Ok, I’m trying to make a standalone autoresponder script, that can be run alongside any script that doesnt have an autoresponder

first i just want to get it so it can read chats and pm’s, from then on it shouldn’t be too hard

here’s what i have so far…

program responder; var msg:string; begin LoadChars2('C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Charsrs2\'); repeat msg:=getchatmsg; if(not(msg=''))then writeln(msg); wait(10); until(isfkeydown(6)); end.

Read full topic
